SENT.plain: A case is reported of a 13 year old Kenyan girl who presented at the Kenyatta National Hospital Dental Clinic with multiple mandibular and maxillary cysts, cutaneous lesions and mandibular prognathism
This combination of clinical and radiographic features led to a diagnosis of basal cell nevus syndrome
This paper is the first reported case of the syndrome in Kenya
The significance of thorough clinical inspection and radiographic screening of suspected cases is discussed
